Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - applied patch for AMD x86-64

Document.author: heikki@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Backport of bug fix in 4.0: do not x-lock rows under LOCK TABLES READ unless the table is a temp table

Document.author: heikki@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Backport of bug fix in 4.0: do not x-lock rows under LOCK TABLES READ unless the table is a temp table

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - applied some changes from the 4.0 tree (enable multiple 
 --conf-environment options, add --with-debug, don't add "-max" 
 prefix just because BDB is enabled)

Document.author: Sinisa@nasamreza.org
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 A fix for --bind-address=hostname

history annotate diffs 
 
 Moved test to correct file

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - applied some fixes from 4.0 mysql.server script 
 - fix to actually parse the documented section ([mysql.server] not 
 [mysql_server]) in my.cnf on startup

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Rewrote nice handling to make more portable

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - reverted non-portable change ("echo -n" does not work on all platforms) 
 - reverted incompatible change (better fix the docs than break existing 
 installations)

Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - fixed tabbing

Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 fix for SHOW VARS for IA64 and other 64 bit systems

Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Better fix for 64 bit CPU ..

Document.author: serg@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 chroot() need chdir("/") afterwards to work

Document.author: serg@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Auto merged

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - removed unused variable $defaults 
 - parse mysql.server section in my.cnf as well

Document.author: Sinisa@nasamreza.org
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 a fix for a bug with HAVING sum_func IN (...)

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Fixed bug in <=> NULL handling

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Fixed bug in MAX() optimization when used with JOIN and ON expressions

history annotate diffs

Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 moving a fix to 4.1.

Document.author: Sinisa@nasamreza.org
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Proper fix for SHOW VARS on 64-bit systems

Document.author: serg@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Security bug: password length check should be in check_user, not check_connections(), 
 otherwise COM_CHANGE_USER is unprotected and can be used for both privilege escalation and buffer overrun

Document.author: serg@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 protect from [heap] buffer overrrun by malicious server

Document.author: serg@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 proper casting in COM_TABLE_DUMP (backported from 4.0)

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - Portability fix for HP compiler on HPUX11

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Removed non standard compiler options 
 
 acinclude.m4@1.47 2002-12-04 16:52:39+02:00 monty@mysql.fi 
 history annotate diffs 
 
 Fixed 'stack direction' check. 
 Workaround for problem with autconf 2.53 on Solaris 
 (Fixes problem with SOCKET_SIZE_TYPE)

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - portability patch to work around bugs in the HP compiler's "inline" 
 handling (backport from 4.0 tree)

Document.author: Sinisa@nasamreza.org
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Added innobase/stamp-h1 stamp-h1 to the ignore list

Document.author: Sinisa@nasamreza.org
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 code cleanup

Document.author: Sinisa@nasamreza.org
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 a test case for double free'ing of pointer in alter table ...

Document.author: serg@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 better fix for read_rows, same for read_one_row

Document.author: heikki@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Heikki will merge to 4.0: Prevent listing the same column twice in an InnoDB index: that will cause index corruption when that col is UPDATEd

Document.author: heikki@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Heikki will merge to 4.0: cleanup

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - make sure to replace HOSTNAME in mysql.server when packing up the binary 
 distribution (this will still be broken for 3.23.54) 
 - make sure that mysql.server in the binary distribution is executable, too

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Fixed rare bug in show processlist which could cause core dump if a new thread was connecting. 
 (We where calling mutex_unlock() without having ever called mutex_lock)

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Added back -max if we are using InnoDB. 
 (This should not be done in the 3.23 version)

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - added missing "test" to $NOHUP_NICENESS test (thanks to Nick Gaugler for 
 spotting and reporting this)

Document.author: lenz@mysql.com
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 - fixed another typo in NOHUP_NICENESS testing

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Forbid SLAVE STOP if the thread executing the query has locked 
 tables. This removes a possible deadlock situation.

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Make --lower-case-table-names default on MacOSX

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 On windows, delete any conflicting 'to' files on rename(from,to)

Document.author: Sinisa@nasamreza.org
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Fix for a bug with mysql_select_db() on manually created 
 database and lower case table names.

Document.author: Sinisa@nasamreza.org
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 fix for a bug in CASE ...WHEN ...

Document.author: monty@mysql.fi
Document.document:
history annotate diffs 
 
 Fixed rare bug in show processlist which could cause core dump if a new thread was connecting. 
 (We where calling mutex_unlock() without having ever called mutex_lock)
